NK040(thi)046:1: // brgyud bskang che ba'i 'gres byang ni /
NK040(thi)046:2: khyed 'khor dpa' bo mkha' 'gro'i dbus na bzhugs //
NK040(thi)046:3: zhi rgyas dbang drag lha tshogs dang //
NK040(thi)046:4: dpa' bo dpa' mo chos skyong dang //
NK040(thi)046:5: dam can ma sring mkha' 'gro dang //
NK040(thi)046:6: las byed sha za khrag 'thung dang //
NK040(thi)046:7: pho nya srog gcod shan pa'i tshogs //
NK040(thi)046:8: sngon gyi thugs dam dgongs pa bzhin //
NK040(thi)046:9: longs spyod tshogs kyi mchod pa 'di //
NK040(thi)046:10: do nub gnas 'dir thugs dam bskang //
